summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Alley in Block Sixty-six (66), A. A. Denny's Addition, by paving the same with brick, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2319 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
